ygData.subject: Kobold Vs Tier'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/27/99 11:40:22 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I definitely do NOT have Kobold separately. I have: Barbarian, Elvish, Halfling, Erudian, Old
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/27/99 11:40:22 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
kalekona@... writes:

> Do you not get a seperate Kolbold language?
>
> I speak both Elder Tier'Dal and Kolbold.....makes no sense
> to me.
>
I definitely do NOT have Kobold separately.
I have:
Barbarian, Elvish, Halfling, Erudian, Old Erudin, Elder Elvish, Tier'Dal,
Dark, Gnoll, Goblin, Lizardman, Froglok, Elder Tier'Dal, Common.

I specifically got the message "You have learned the Basics of Kobold" then
when I checked the languages choice... (on the chat screen, not in the skills
chart) I had Elder Tier'Dal instead.

The Confisuion may be that it is listed one way as a skill, another in the
languages list.

Sonoroud
